feed.title: SAP Community - NW ABAP User Administration and Authorization
feed.subtitle: NW ABAP User Administration and Authorization Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Deactivation of data sync betwenn SU01 and HR Master Data (PA30) for specific field
entry.content:
Hi SAP community,

We'd like to deactivate the sync of the title value in the adress data of SU01 and title value of HR Master Data (PA30).

Currently if we set the title value in HR Master Data of a user to for example Mr. or Miss the value of the title field in the address section of SU01 gets changed as well.
Usually a very useful function but for several reasons not for us.

So is there a way to prevent that the title value in the address data in SU01 of a user gets updated?

Best regards,
Joyce

entry.title: Multiple SAP on-premise systems authentication and authorization to single web application
entry.content:
It has been a long time that I want to figure out how to do authentication from one web application (NodeJS) to multiple SAP on-premise systems (ERP, and S/4). So, by definition, I have developed a web application and I need to visualize data located on the SAP side. In other words, I want to use the SAP Side as the database layer and the web app as the presentation layer. The main challenge that I can't figure out is how to do the authentication and authorization to multiple SAP systems (at some points the system may be inside the customer network) from a single publicly hosted web application that is based on NodeJS. 

How do I want to use the SAP system after authentication and authorization?

1. Function call

2. Consuming CDS views

 

I can setup more services, but I don't have a concise knowledge of whether those services would be useful or not. E.g. SSO.

entry.title: Upgrade SAP CUA netweaver environment to S/4HANA 2023
entry.content:
Hello,

I want to better understand this note about SAP CUA: https://me.sap.com/notes/3442287/E

My customer is live with S/4HANA Private Cloud Edition v 2023 FP2.

In their current OP CUA environment (which is a pure NetWeaver stack SAP_BASIS 7.52) , they cannot manage IANA time zones. According to the note; they would need to upgrade to the environment to at least version SAP_BASIS 7.57 SP00 (S/4HANA 2022) to be able to manage those IANA timezones.  

As their S/4HANA Private Cloud Edition is 2023 FP2 and will a child of the central system, they best upgrade to the 2023 version with SAP_BASIS 7.58 00. 

S/4HANA 20237.5800

As this is purely the BASIS stack they need, and there is no S/4 HANA functionality nor S/4 HANA processes running on that environment, what is the effort to upgrade and does that require an S/4HANA OP license?

Can you please advise?

Many thanks,

Goedele

entry.title: Last Logon date not updated in SAP in USR02 table.
entry.content:
Hi SAP,

we have encountered an Audit issue where user when login in from SAPGUI, users login is getting recorded properly in USR02 table. 
But when users are login in from Fiori or salesfore, etc. the login Records are not updating in table, though the users are having same SAP id.

entry.title: Duplicate role deletion from Users.
entry.content:
Dear Expert,

we have GRC System with our Production (SSP) system. as per the requirement users are aplly role from GRC System, but some most of the roles are duplicate in the  system, is there any way to delete duplicate roles from the user automatically, there should be condition if the same roles are there if one roles are expired, can be delete, i.e. duplicate role need to verify and then delete old one, which is expired. if validity period of this role is expired, then role should be deleted.

please guide us can we do this on monthly basis from any background job which will be automated in GRC or in the system.

Thanks


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: How to find where OData service is coming from in the catalog.
entry.content:
Hi, 

I have an OData service called R3TR IWSV UI_JOURNALENTRY_OTA_O2 0001 which I can see is being pulled into a catalog that I have built for display purposes, so no change access is permitted. This Odata is bringing in 01/02 access for F_MANDATE  but the issue is I cannot find which App is bringing this into the catalog, as this needs to be removed or changed in SU24....but I cannot seem to figure out how to actually find where its originating from. I have checked the catalog for clues on the "Action" but all of the actions are listed as "Display". There are too many apps to start removing 1 by 1 to see which app is populated the S_SERVICE value. 

Can someone provide some way of finding this? I have tried to check a way of mapping the application resource to S_SERVICE but sadly I came up empty.

entry.title: Issue with GA SAP S/4HANA - Users Not Visible
entry.content:
Dear SAP community,

i have recieved an answer of a ticket: 

"To check developers, you need to install SAP Note 3333812 in your development environment and execute that report."

This was helpful, but I can only see 4 developers listed, whereas the SAP measurements show that we have 9 developer licenses in the system.

Could you please clarify this discrepancy?
Additionally, could you provide more detailed guidance on how to identify the other users holding developer licenses?

Thanks in advanced 

Best regards, 

Feras

entry.title: Authorization problem BW Composite provider
entry.content:
Hello, 
I have an issue with a new authorization role I created in a SAP BW/4HANA system. 

The test user is able to view aDSOs and create Queries on Composites, but she is not able to view the Composite in Eclipse. With my user, in the same eclipse installation I see everything alright (I created two projects within my installation for the two users to ensure that it's not the eclipse version's fault). 

My view:

User's view (empty folder):

The authorization is set similar to the aDSO authorization which works fine (the Composite one is even less restrictive):

aDSO restriction:

Does anyone have any hint for me in how to fix this interesting problem? 

Thank you very much! 

Br, Nina

entry.title: Details required on the usage of communication users
entry.content:
Hi SAP,

 

We are planning to change icf/reject_expired_passwd and rfc/reject_expired_passwd parameters to the value 1 in the systems and before changing the parameter value, we have collected the communication users list for which we need to change the initial user passwords. Before changing the passwords we would like to get the details of RFC's or any other connection name where the users are being used in the interface systems, Can you please share the details like is there any reports or a table on how to fetch the details from the system.

 

 

Thank you.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

Is there any T-Code/table to identify such scenario?

entry.title: How to administrate change documents?
entry.content:
The below Change Document data needs to be retained/archived:

User Change Data:

  • Change history for logon data - USH02
  • Change history for authorizations - USH04
  • Change history for authorization profiles - USH10
  • Change history for authorization values - USH12

 

Role Change Data:

  • CDHDR
  • CDPOS


Kindly advise on how the data can be transferred as CDHDR, CDPOS also contains Change logs from another table as well.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: User management (SU01) / Work Center / Function field length
entry.content:
In transaction SU01, under the 'Address' tab and the 'Work Center' sub-tab, we can find the 'Function' field. This field has a character limit of 40. This is insufficient for our purposes.

How do you handle this? Do you give every employee only a short job function? Or do you use another field?

entry.title: Authorization Issue but the user already have the authorization on their profile
entry.content:
Hello gurus!

I'm facing a problem in which users have the necessary authorization to perform their function, but when they try to access it, they get an authorization error.

In su53 comes the object and values that the user already has in their role.

Roles are generated, they have the objects and values already requested in the role and it only works again when I redo the transport of that role.

If anyone can help me, I'd appreciate it!

Thank you,

Andre Macedo

entry.title: Issue with Screen Enhancement PBO in SAP AS03 (Asset Master) - On-Premise 2020 vs. 2023
entry.content:
Dear Team/Colleagues,

I am encountering an issue with a screen enhancement implemented for the Asset Master Data (transactions AS01, AS02, AS03) in our SAP on-premise 2020 system.

I followed the steps outlined in the SAP Community blog post: https://community.sap.com/t5/application-development-and-automation-blog-posts/adding-z-fields-to-asset-master-screen-aist0002-t-codes-as01-as02-as03/ba-p/13208878 to add custom Z-fields.

The problem is that the Process Before Output (PBO) module of my custom subscreen is not being triggered in our SAP on-premise 2020 release. As a result, I am unable to disable fields in AS03, and any validations or Listbox functionalities defined in the PBO are not working.

Interestingly, I've observed that the PBO is being triggered correctly for the same enhancement in an SAP on-premise 2023 release system.

Could you please help me understand why this behaviour differs between the two releases and what I might have missed or need to adjust for our 2020 environment?

Thank you

entry.title: Can you tell me what authoirzation is missing for this SU53 screenshot
USGRPT table TEXT field translation
entry.content: I was trying to translate the field TEXT from this table but it doesn't appear on the tab " go to -> translate" like others object do. So the thing is, I went to se63 transaction and tried to use the object types DOMA and DTEL but I didn't get the results I was looking for. Please, someone had the same problem as me and can bring some light to the issue? thanks in advanced.

entry.title: Population of field TECHDESC in table USR21
entry.content:
Since recent upgrade to SAP S/4HANA, we have noticed that some workflows are checking for a value in field TECHDESC in table USR21.

In table USR21 field TECHDESC, we have records that are populated with First Name & Last Name, and we have blank records in that field also.

We would like to know what is the data flow path / update mechanism, for the field TECHDESC to get populated with a value?  Is there a link to HR infotype to obtain the person's first name & last name?


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.
